channel.title: Soldier update + King of the Hill + Trading
channel.description:
[url='https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=923774']https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=923774[/url]
Bluff or not? :stuck_out_tongue: Personally, I've been wanting a soldier update since they started doing them, although personally, the trading system is a bit late, people having multiples of many items now, less incentive to trade. .

item.title: Soldier update + King of the Hill + Trading
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

King of the Hill has been done already in custom maps for TFC. It didn’t really catch on.

So, what necessitates Demo vs. Engy together?

Don’t.

Collision:

Beside the spy, demo is like the engy’s other arch enemy.

Pipe grenade or sticky bomb barrage is like, the most effective way to take out a sentry and the engy working on it without taking damage.

That’s what I meant in my previous post.

Read full topic
item.source: Soldier update + King of the Hill + Trading

item.description:
Shit just got real.
My bet is on flak cannon snatched from nazis during the WWII

And, King of the fucking Hill.

people having multiples of many items now, less incentive to trade.

not all of them. And, yes, hats.

EDIT: haha LOL
